Verses: 1 YESUKIRISTHUVINUDAIYA OOZHIYAKKAARANUM, YAAKKOBINUDAIYA SAGODHARANUMAAYIRUKKIRA YOODHAA, PIDHAAVAAGIYA THEVANAALE PARISUTHTHAMAAKKAPPATTAVARGALUM, YESUKIRISTHUVINAALE KAAKKAPPATTAVARGALUMAAGIYA AZHAIKKAPPATTAVARGALUKKU EZHUDHUGIRADHAAVADHU:
2 UNGALUKKU IRAKKAMUM SAMAADHAANAMUM ANBUM PERUGAKKADAVADHU.

3 PIRIYAMAANAVARGALE, PODHUVAANA IRATCHIPPAIKKURITHTHU UNGALUKKU EZHUDHUMPADI NAAN MIGAVUM KARUTHTHULLAVANAAYIRUKKAIYIL, PARISUTHTHAVAANGALUKKU ORUVISAI OPPUKKODUKKAPPATTA VISUVAASATHTHIRKAAGA NEENGAL THAIRIYAMAAIP PORAADAVENDUMENDRU UNGALUKKU EZHUDHI UNARTHTHUVADHU ENAKKU AVASIYAMAAIK KANDADHU.

4 ENENIL NAMADHU DHEVANUDAIYA KIRUBAIYAIK KAAMAVIGAARATHTHUKKEDHUVAAGAP PURATTI, ONDRAANA AANDAVARAAGIYA DHEVANAIYUM, NAMMUDAIYA KARTHTHARAAGIYA IYESUKIRISTHUVAIYUM MARUDHALIKKIRA BAKTHIYATRAVARGALAAGIYA SILAR PAKKAVAZHIYAAI NUZHAINDHIRUKKIRAARGAL; AVARGAL INDHA AAKKINAIKKULLAAVAARGALENDRU POORVATHTHILE EZHUDHIYIRUKKIRADHU.

5 NEENGAL MUNNAME ARINDHIRUNDHAALUM, NAAN UNGALUKKU NINAIPPOOTTA VIRUMBUGIRADHENNAVENIL, KARTHTHAR THAMADHU JANATHTHAI EGIPTHU DHESATHTHILIRUNDHU VARAPPANNI IRATCHITHTHU, PINBU VISUVAASIYAADHAVARGALAI AZHITHTHAAR.

6 THANGALUDAIYA AADHIMENMAIYAIK KAATHTHUKKOLLAAMAL, THANGALUKKURIYA VAASASTHALATHTHAI VITTUVITTA THOODHARGALAIYUM, MAGAA NAALIN NIYAAYATHTHEERPPUKKENDRU NITHTHIYA SANGILIGALINAALE KATTI, ANDHAGAARATHTHILADAITHTHU VAITHTHIRUKKIRAAR.

7 APPADIYE SODHOM KOMORAA PATTANATHTHAARGALUM, AVAIGALAI SOOZHNDHA PATTANATHTHAARGALUM, AVARGALAIP POL VIBASAARAMPANNI, ANNIYA MAAMSATHTHAITH THODARNDHU, NITHTHIYA AKKINIYIN AAKKINAIYAIADAINDHU, THIRUSHTAANDHAMAAGA VAIKKAPPATTIRUKKIRAARGAL.
8 APPADIPPOLAVE, SOPPANAKKAARARAAGIYA IVARGALUM MAAMSATHTHAI ASUSIPPADUTHTHIKKONDU, KARTHTHATHTHUVATHTHAI ASATTAIPANNI, MAGATHTHUVANGALAITH DHOOSHIKKIRAARGAL.

9 PIRADHAANA THOODHANAAGIYA MIKAAVEL, MOSEYIN SAREERATHTHAIK KURITHTHUP PISAASUTANE THARKKITHTHUPPESINAPODHU, AVANAITH THOOSHANAMAAIK KUTRAPPADUTHTHATH THUNIYAAMAL: KARTHTHAR UNNAIK KADINDHUKOLVAARAAGA ENDRU SONNAAN.
10 IVARGAL THANGALUKKUTH THERIYAADHAVAIGALAITH THOOSHIKKIRAARGAL; BUTHTHIYILLAADHA MIRUGANGALAIPPOLA SUBAAVAPPADI THANGALUKKUTH THERINDHIRUKKIRAVAIGALAALE THANGALAIK KEDUTHTHUKKOLLUGIRAARGAL.
11 IVARGALUKKU AIYO! IVARGAL KAAYEENUDAIYA VAZHIYIL NADANDHU, PILEYAAM KOOLIKKAAGA SEYDHA VANJAGATHTHILE VIRAINDHODI, KORAA EDHIRTHTHUPPESINA PAAVATHTHIRKULLAAGI, KETTUPPONAARGAL.

12 IVARGAL UNGAL ANBIN VIRUNDHUGALIL KARAIGALAAYIRUNDHU, BAYAMINDRIK KOODA VIRUNDHUNDU, THANGALAITH THAANGALE MEYTHTHUKKOLLUGIRAARGAL; IVARGAL KAATRUGALAAL ADIYUNDODUGIRA THANNEERATRA MEGANGALUM, ILAIYUDHIRNDHU KANIYATRU IRANDUDHARAN SETHTHU VERATRUP PONA MARANGALUM,
13 THANGAL AVAMAANANGALAI NURAITHALLUGIRA AMALIYAANA KADALALAIGALUM, MAARKKANTHAPPI ALAIGIRA NATCHATHTHIRANGALUMAAYIRUKKIRAARGAL; IVARGALUKKAAGA ENDRENDRAIKKUM KAARIRULE VAIKKAPPATTIRUKKIRADHU.

14 AADHAAMUKKU EZHAANDHALAIMURAIYAANA ENOKKUM IVARGALAIKKURITHTHU: IDHO, ELLAARUKKUM NIYAAYATHTHEERPPUK KODUKKIRADHARKUM, AVARGALIL AVABAKTHIYULLAVARGAL YAAVARUM AVABAKTHIYAAI SEYDHUVANDHA SAGALA AVABAKTHIYAANA KIRIYAIGALINIMITHTHAMUM,

15 THAMAKKU VIRODHAMAAI AVABAKTHIYULLA PAAVIGAL PESINA KADINA VAARTHTHAIGALELLAAVATRINIMITHTHAMUM, AVARGALAIK KANDIKKIRADHARKUM, AAYIRAMAAYIRAMAANA THAMADHU PARISUTHTHAVAANGALODUNKOODA KARTHTHARVARUGIRAAR ENDRU MUNNARIVITHTHAAN.

16 IVARGAL MURUMURUKKIRAVARGALUM, MURAIYIDUGIRAVARGALUM, THANGAL ICHCHAIGALINPADI NADAKKIRAVARGALUMAAYIRUKKIRAARGAL; IVARGALUDAIYA VAAI IRUMAAPPAANAVAIGALAIPPESUM; THARPOZHIVUKKAAGA MUGASTHUDHI SEYVAARGAL.
17 NEENGALO PIRIYAMAANAVARGALE, NAMMUDAIYA KARTHTHARAAGIYA YESUKIRISTHUVIN APPOSTHALARAAL MUN SOLLAPPATTA VAARTHTHAIGALAI NINAIVUKOORUNGAL.
18 KADAISIKKAALATHTHILE THANGAL THUNMAARKKAMAANA ICHCHAIGALINPADI NADAKKIRA PARIYAASAKKAARAR THONDRUVAARGAL ENDRU UNGALUKKU SONNAARGALE.
19 IVARGAL PIRINDHU POGIRAVARGALUM, JENMASUBAAVATHTHAARUM, AAVIYILLAADHAVARGALUMAAME.
20 NEENGALO PIRIYAMAANAVARGALE, UNGAL MAGAA PARISUTHTHAMAANA VISUVAASATHTHINMEL UNGALAI URUDHIPPADUTHTHIKKONDU, PARISUTHTHA AAVIKKUL JEBAMPANNI,
21 DHEVANUDAIYA ANBILE UNGALAIK KAATHTHUKKONDU, NITHTHIYA JEEVANUKKEDHUVAAGA NAMMUDAIYA KARTHTHARAAGIYA YESUKKIRISTHUVINUDAIYA IRAKKATHTHAIPPERAK KAATHTHIRUNGAL.
22 ALLAAMALUM, NEENGAL PAGUTHTHARIVULLAVARGALAAYIRUNDHU, SILARUKKU IRAKKAM PAARAATTI, SILARAI AKKINIYILIRUNDHU IZHUTHTHUVITTU, BAYATHTHODE IRATCHITHTHU,
23 MAAMSATHTHAAL KARAIPPATTIRUKKIRA VASTHIRATHTHAIYUM VERUTHTHUTH THALLUNGAL.
24 VAZHUVAADHAPADI UNGALAIK KAAKKAVUM, THAMADHU MAGIMAIYULLA SANNIDHAANATHTHILE MIGUNDHA MAGIZHCHCHIYODE UNGALAI MAASATRAVARGALAAI NIRUTHTHAVUM VALLAMAIYULLAVARUM,
25 THAAM ORUVARE GNAANAMULLAVARUMAAGIYA NAMMUDAIYA IRATCHAGARAANA DHEVANUKKU GANAMUM MAGATHTHUVAMUM VALLAMAIYUM ADHIGAARAMUM IPPOZHUDHUM EPPOZHUDHUM UNDAAVADHAAGA. AAMEN.
